page.title: 03SETTLEMENTS-CHAPEL YARD
page.content: {Chapel Yard}_ so named because of a former Moravian Chapel, is a picturesque hamlet of six houses about 50 yds from the main Kimbolton to Pertenhall Road. A house named "The Manse" remains with the Chapel as an outbuilding. A Lych Gate Arch bears the text "Because I live, ye shall live also." There is a low slate wall and an old iron pump nearby. Twenty one people live in the hamlet. One typical kitchen garden contained neat rows of peas, beans, carrots, lettuce, beetroot, potatoes, etc and fruits such as gooseberries and rhubarb. The Greater Celandine and Vipers Bingloss grow in the area.
